Navigation.title: 5+ competing navigation systems
Navigation.description: Navigation.tsx (desktop), ThumbMenu.tsx (FAB), MobileNavigation.tsx (mobile header), MobileBottomNav.tsx, UnifiedBottomNav.tsx, MobileHamburgerMenu.tsx all provide navigation. ThumbMenu and UnifiedBottomNav likely overlap on mobile.
Navigation.recommendation: Keep Navigation.tsx (desktop) + MobileNavigation.tsx with UnifiedBottomNav. Delete ThumbMenu and MobileBottomNav.

Messages.title: 3 ConversationList, 2 MessageThread, 3 message hooks — should be 1 of each
Messages.description: ConversationList/Optimized/Realtime (30KB), MessageThread/Optimized (10KB), useMessages/useOptimized/useRealtime (30KB). ~70KB of redundant messaging code.
Messages.recommendation: Consolidate into single ConversationList, MessageThread, and useMessages with realtime + optimization built in.

Messages.title: /messages page is a lazy-loaded redirect shim
Messages.description: Messages.tsx only redirects to /direct-messages. Should be a <Navigate> in the router.

Profile.title: Private/public profile components are near-identical pairs (~78KB duplication)
Profile.description: ProfileHeader≈PublicProfileHeader (26KB pair), ProfileContent≈PublicProfileContent (32KB pair), ProfileSidebarNav≈PublicProfileSidebar (19KB pair).
Profile.recommendation: Merge each pair into a single component with an `isOwner` prop.

Profile.title: 4 mobile-specific profile layouts (~33KB)
Profile.description: MobileProfileHeader, MobileProfileContent, MobileProfileLayout, PublicMobileProfileLayout duplicate responsive logic.
Profile.recommendation: Use responsive Tailwind classes in unified profile components. Delete all 4 mobile variants.

Profile.title: Broken vanity URL redirect
Profile.description: <Navigate to="/u/:username"> uses literal ":username" instead of resolving the route param.
Profile.recommendation: Fix with a wrapper component or remove the /vanity/ route.

Hooks.title: 2 identical debounce hooks
Hooks.description: useDebounce.ts and useDebouncedValue.ts have the same useState+useEffect+setTimeout logic.
Hooks.recommendation: Keep useDebounce.ts, delete useDebouncedValue.ts, update imports.

Routes.title: 3 routes point to Auth page (/auth, /login, /register)
Routes.description: All render the same Auth component with no behavioral difference.

Components.title: LCARS components scattered across 4+ directories
Components.description: components/lcars/, admin/lcars/, profile/lcars/, plus root-level files. Impossible to maintain consistent design system.
Components.recommendation: Consolidate into single src/components/lcars/ with barrel export.

Components.title: "Improved" variants exist alongside originals (ImprovedFAQ, ImprovedHowItWorks)
Components.description: Naming suggests replacement was intended but never completed.
Components.recommendation: Merge improved logic into page components and delete the "improved" files.

Components.title: 3 space background components (~38KB)
Components.recommendation: Consolidate into a single configurable SpaceBackground component.

Performance.title: 6 global components render on every page load
Performance.description: ThumbMenu, GlobalPresenceTracker, ChatWindow, DaystromCursorGlow, LCARSEdgeBars, ImpersonationBanner all render in App.tsx unconditionally.
Performance.recommendation: Lazy-load ChatWindow + ImpersonationBanner. Remove ThumbMenu. Consider making decorative effects opt-in.

Performance.title: ~1.5MB+ of heavy optional dependencies
Performance.description: three.js, konva, xlsx, recharts, framer-motion, lottie-react add significant bundle weight.
Performance.recommendation: Audit konva and lottie-react usage — remove if unused. Ensure all are code-split to pages that need them.

Codebase.title: Codebase size: 320 components, 40 pages, 67 hooks (3.3MB source)
Codebase.description: Large codebase with significant redundancy makes maintenance difficult and increases bundle size.
Codebase.recommendation: Target: reduce components from 320 to ~208 by merging duplicates and removing dead code.
